data.message: Or you get blocked for being social, smh.

replies.message: Hi Robert. It sounds like you may have used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access the feature again. In the meantime, you can read more about Facebook policies at: http://on.fb.me/1qJkLgk. -Sarah

^ amen. All friends were strangers at some point in our lives... Imagine u being blocked in real life, facebook wouldn't even exists because no one would have real friends... Etc... I can understand if someone is adding a hundred friends in an hour... But a handful of new people a day shouldn't be considered "abusive"

You leave the room to let the dogs out and get a message that says "You're going too fast to enjoy your Facebook experience. Please slow down or we will block you"  I'm still waiting to find out your definition of too fast. Takes the boys about 5 minutes to do their thing, so unless my guinea pig is an escape artist, no one is touching my computer.
